name: Moon Pup 2069
description:
Moon Pup 2069 is a Fake Gamer Girl Comics Game. It's a shmuppy (rhymes with puppy?) action game with a randomized indie rock soundtrack by the band Patty Melts. 

Game by Ashlynn Barker. Music by Patty Melts. Link to the OST here.

Please email fggcomic@gmail.com with any questions, comments, concerns, etc.! <3

You can support the game here: patreon.com/fggcomic

Thanks for playing!

-Ashlynn
